name: boxalino/boxalino-client-sdk-php
description: The Boxalino Client SDK provides a simple and efficient usage of Boxalino Search & Recommendations services (based on the p13n Thrift client libraries as separately provided in respective git-hub repositories) and to Boxalino Data Intelligence especially for Data Synchronization (define the structure of your data, push and publish your data structure configuration, push data in dev/prod and full/delta to Boxalino).
